sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"经历，经受，遭受"之意。
means: undergo ： 多指经受艰难、痛苦、不愉快或危险等事。
experience ： 指亲身经受或体验某事。
sustain ： 指遭受痛苦或承受负担。
suffer常可与sustain通用，尤指受到损害或伤害。

sentence.Network_en: Fans may undergo body searches by security guards.
sentence.Network_cn: 球迷可能要接受保安人员的搜身检查。

sentence.Network_en: They have introduced a new system whereby all employees must undergo regular training.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们采用了新的制度，所有的雇员都必须定期进行培训。

list.abs: In the intestine , free iodine or iodate undergoes reduction to iodide before absorption ., 在肠内被吸收以前游离碘或碘酸盐还原成碘化物.
...高考英语常用词组荟萃(开头字母U)词语解释under control处于控制之下undergo experiences经历，体验under the circumstances在这种情况下，(情况)既然如此.
comfort care of patients undergoing oxygen inhalation ., 吸氧病人的舒适护理.
anesthesia and perioperative management of very old patients undergoing major operation ., 高龄危重患者手术麻醉方法和管理.
She is set to undergo surgery tomorrow ., 她将于明天接受手术.

entry.def: If you undergo something necessary or unpleasant, it happens to you.

example.ex: New recruits have been undergoing training in recent weeks...
example.tran: 最近几周，新兵正在接受训练。

example.ex: He underwent an agonising 48-hour wait for the results of tests.
example.tran: 他苦苦等待了48个小时，化验结果才出来。

means.word_mean: 1. of mental or physical states or experiences;

sentences.sentence: "We had many trials to go through"

auth_sentence.content: Lemming populations also undergo periodic boom and bust cycles.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lemming populations also undergo periodic boom and bust cycles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lemming populations also undergo periodic boom and bust cycles.

auth_sentence.content: Many undergo complete changes of shape during their lifecycles.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many undergo complete changes of shape during their lifecycles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many undergo complete changes of shape during their lifecycles.

auth_sentence.content: The figure will undergo most curious elongations and contractions.
auth_sentence.res_content: The figure will undergo most curious elongations and contractions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The figure will undergo most curious elongations and contractions.

Sentence.sentence: But the worst part is that print version of textbooks are constantly undergoing revisions.

means.word_mean: 经历，经受（变化、不快的事等）

sentences.en: He underwent a lot of hardships in his childhood.
sentences.cn: 他在童年时代经历了许多坎坷。

sentences.en: The explorers had to undergo much suffering.
sentences.cn: 探险者不得不忍受很多困苦。

sentences.en: This new plane is undergoing safety tests.
sentences.cn: 这架新型飞机正在接受安全试验。

jushi.english: China had undergone a profound change with the completion of the Ninth Five-Year Plan.
jushi.chinese: 随着第九个五年计划的完成,中国经历了一场深刻的变化。

jushi.english: The ship successfully underwent sea trials in coastal waters.
jushi.chinese: 那条船在近海水域试航成功。
